definitions.definition: A popular garden plant, of the genus Fuchsia , of the Onagraceae family , shrubs with red, pink or purple flowers .
A purplish-red colour , the color of fuchsin , an aniline dye .

main_definition: A popular garden plant, of the genus Fuchsia , of the Onagraceae family , shrubs with red, pink or purple flowers .
secondary_definitions: A purplish-red colour , the color of fuchsin , an aniline dye .
